metadata.title: CVE-2022-3740 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 12.9 prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to15.5.2. A group owner may be able to bypass External Authorization check,if it is enabled, to access git repositories and package registries byusing Deploy tokens or Deploy keys .

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
